column1: a silver chalice set with moonstones
a silver-plated steel longsword with jet set in hilt
a carved harp of exotic wood with ivory inlay and zircon gems
a gold dragon comb set with red garnets as eyes
a bottle stopper cork embossed with gold leaf and set with amethysts
a ceremonial electrum dagger with a black pearl in the pommel
an obsidian statuette with gold fittings and inlay
